website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for light amateur playing, but pros will still get a good practice. We suggest replacing original ball for better results.
pros: Net is professional height for professional practice
Heavy duty stakes maintain tension well
Suitable for beach volleyball as well
cons: Complaints of missing parts and instructions

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of buying nets that were so poor quality that the plastic poles would break after one or two uses so I hunted for something reasonably priced that would last. I think this one seems like it will a good quality net for our family get togethers. I especially loved that we could adjust one end of the net to level the height out as there was a small hill one side sat on. I wasn't too interested in the boundary rope but they guys insisted we put it out and they appreciated it.
customer_reviews.author: lovinlivinlife

customer_reviews.title: Volleyball Mom
customer_reviews.text: We bought this net for our daughter that plays both high school volleyball & club volleyball. The net is very sturdy, nice steel poles. This net is Men's Volleyball high, but can be adjusted with the included pins, it didn't take long to put up. We left the net at its highest point to help our daughter clear more vertical jumps, and blocks. A few day after setting it up we had a summer storm and thought the net had fallen, but NO it was up with no problems. I would recommend this product and it's price well for the quality
customer_reviews.author: Jgbn35

customer_reviews.title: This volleyball set is great and my kids love having their friends over to ...
customer_reviews.text: This volleyball set is great and my kids love having their friends over to play. A few times we left it out in the windy weather and it held up pretty good. It's really easy to set up too and love having the rope to mark off the boundaries. I haven't had any trouble with the ball going flat as mentioned in previous reviews but even if it did, volleyballs are pretty cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J Ludgate

customer_reviews.title: Great backyard volleyball set
customer_reviews.text: Great backyard volleyball set! My 13 year old and her friend set it up by themselves with no troubles. Very sturdy, adjustable poles. So much better than the plastic ones that bend so easily! We've had college kids and adults playing on it and the net has held up to spiking and blocks. The boundary ropes are great for the hardcore games, but we don't use them just for fun games. This set would work great for sand games too. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: lizw13

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: I paid more for this net thinking it would be better quality but it’s not. Parts of the net aren’t connected and it was missing a metal post. Therefore it can’t be raised to men’s height.
customer_reviews.author: mark dulz

customer_reviews.title: Volleyball Popped when blowing it up : (
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, We have not put this set up yet. We bought it because of the summer get togethers but since Covid we haven't had any and volleyball is one sport that our government has banned because of Covid. So no one will play. Anyway, we were checking out the set because we finally had enough family members to play and first tried blowing up the ball. It must of been defective because it popped and it wasn't even blown up all the way. Oh well, discouraged I hope that the set is ok since it is past the time to return. I'm giving the set 2 stars until we set up the net.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Clan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my daughter to practice her volleyball serving. She’s in 6th grade. She takes this thing down, and puts it up, usually just with 1 other friend, or even on her own. It’s a great product, great quality, and easy to use/put up. I have to watch the anchors though... she tends to forget about them, and I have to go search for them. We take this thing camping, to Nanas, and use it here at home
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Weak equipment
customer_reviews.text: There are plenty of cheap volleyball sets costing $ 20 - $30. So, when you pay twice that amount, you would expect a much more solid set, designed properly. Unfortunately, that's not the case. The two net poles are held upright by three anchored strings and the net itself. So guess what is going to happen the first time, the ball is hit into the net. The whole setup collapses. Be prepared to be embarrassed in front of our friends and guests.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kumtakar

customer_reviews.title: Beyond what I thought I would get for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Such an easy setup, you would think that it won't stand up at first because the poles aren't staked down. Once the line is staked down on both sides however bragging the poles the net is very taught along with the poles. It is nice too that the net is adjustable for height. My daughter is an avid volleyball player and plays on her school team and she loves it very much. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up with 3 people
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up with 3 people. Net does need to be adjusted, for sagging, after a few days. My only complaint was the volleyball that came with the whole kit. After trying to use it the first time, the seams started splitting. I e-mailed the company and they responded right back with sending out a new ball. We will try it out again when it arrives. Otherwise I the rating would have been 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie P.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: We've had cheap volleyball sets before and decided to purchase something that would hopefully last longer. We've used this a number of times over the last couple of years. The metal poles and heavy duty rope have held up well. The net is getting a little stretched out but not bad. This was a good set for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S

customer_reviews.title: Missing the VOLLEYBALL
customer_reviews.text: I had my 15 year old set up the net and he had zero issues with it. I would give it an overall 5 stars but the advertisement stated that the volleyball set included a volleyball but no volleyball was found in the packaging. As I had planned to use for a family event I now have to take the time to go and purchase a ball. Not happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: James Betancourt

customer_reviews.title: Finally a durable net at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: If like me you have purchased several flimsy frames unwilling to spend hundreds on a net that will last more than a week then this is for you. Very good quality. The only complaint is the instructions to figure out the loop on the anchor ropes is not very helpful and I could not find the video it directed me to, but you can find with a google search.
customer_reviews.author: OCDC

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to assemble; very poor instructions. Probably easier if you have owned a similar guyline assembly before but we had not. The boundry line ropes took 30 mins to untangle, were missing the plastic thing that you store it with and the mid-point guidelines were mismarked. I called Park & Sun and they agreed send a new boundary line set with plastic thing.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer of Things

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We have had this product for a month now and have been using it in our backyard. It wasn’t too difficult to set up and is working great. My 13 year old is in volleyball at school and wanted to play at home too. This is a great set for her to practice with. It’s much more sturdy than i expected and the ball works great too. Overall i am extremely satisfied and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Volleyball Net
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. You need a few people to set it up on beach but held up fine in wind(we added sand bags made from plastic grocery bags to the anchors). Would definitely recommend this for beach play. We also added streamers to the string anchors so no one would run into them unknowingly.
customer_reviews.author: KTRuck

customer_reviews.title: Embarrassing Quality - didn't last 6 minutes into Game
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT what you want!! I cannot stress enough this net will not handle one missed jump serve - the top strap holding the net together lasted all of 6 minutes into a doubles match. You get what you pay for and this isn't even worthy of old ladies playing double B. Get the Spectrum net I have pictured below.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: It was an easy set up
customer_reviews.text: It was an easy set up. No issues. The net was just the right height. Didn't break or sag even after quite a few missed serves. The only issue I had was that it did NOT come with the volleyball, as described. I got everything, including the pump, BUT the actual ball.
customer_reviews.author: Irene V.

customer_reviews.title: Weeks of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is up in our yard now for a month and we’re enjoying it! It was a tad hard for my kids to set up by themselves and they got the boundary cord badly tangled, but we succeeded in untangling it.
customer_reviews.author: Zvulun, Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good product, easy to assemble, and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy to put up. Didn't know I would get a ball and that was a bonus with the pump. We live at the beach, so lots of use. Used it for badminton also. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Avila Gal

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Horrible returning it! Everything was missing excepted for 5 ploes and net. Missing the 6th pole, ground stakes, tenstion rope, and volleyball. My daughter was so sad her Christmas gift had to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great addition to our yard games. Everyone loves to get together and play volleyball in the summertime. This has met my expectations and it is as regulation you can get for what you pay for except the actual ball. The ball is somewhat poor quality. I left everything up through storms and high winds 1 week and it held up very well!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Lasts wind and rain in a Gulf coast
customer_reviews.text: Me (petite lady) and kids set it up during quarantine. It has lasted througha number of storms. Periodically, I have to move the tight-downs to raise the middle up. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JenP

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, but ball is busted after first use
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, although I’ve only used it once. I also wish it had a hammer so nail the stakes in. The only problem is that after the FIRST use the ball busted a seam. That is quite disappointing. I will have to get a new ball.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Not a good quality net for competitive play. The pulley system to tighten the net is not easily done and has to be retightened every few points and it is only one height. And the tallest “men’s” setting is not high enough and not regulation height.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great product for low price.
customer_reviews.text: This product far exceeded my expectations. At the price I purchased it, I thought that it might have only lasted one use. Used it all summer in various locations. Still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: XZooM13

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My family has a great time in the backyard with this net. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Anabel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality net
customer_reviews.text: It is a good quality net for a decent price. It is way better than other net sets we have had that turn out to be super cheap quality and do not hold up well. Set up and take down are both relatively easy. The stakes could be improved as they pull out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for about a month, holds up well, very solid and the family loves it.
customer_reviews.author: tn new york

customer_reviews.title: Love. Would love to give it 5 stars...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It’s great very easy to put up and take down. Only reason I haven’t given five stars is that one of the push buttons that locks poles together must’ve come loose and got lost so now it’s harder to keep poles together. Wish I knew where to get spare part.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Extremely large
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize how Big this would be in my yard and the rainstorm nearly blew the entire netting away. Unable to keep up it’s a little more than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Ayan

customer_reviews.title: Full size net!
customer_reviews.text: You will be completely satisfied with this volleyball set. The net is a full size net. My 14 year old plays volleyball for her school and we have purchased sets prior to purchasing this one and nothing can compare! The quality is excellent. We did not use the ball. The set up was easy and we are so happy. Do not bother buying anything else. This is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Marleen Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Great for backyard parties
customer_reviews.text: Great for backyard parties. Later bought some badminton rackets to use with this net as well. Easy storage, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: OhioPop

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Really happy I went with this one for backyard fun. My 15 year old practices on it. Net stays tight.
customer_reviews.author: Hardyone

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and I unfortunately did not open the box until after 30 days of receipt. It is missing a pole. Now I am stuck with a product that I can't use and can't return.
customer_reviews.author: karyl rattay

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to use in my backyard as a complete set. This product was not as advertised and did not come with the ball. Would not have bought it at that price just for the net.
customer_reviews.author: Laura FitzSimmons

customer_reviews.title: Decent set but not as easy to setup as I expected based on other reviews
customer_reviews.text: This set has everything you need for a solid volleyball court but setup was not any easier than other, less expensive, sets available.
customer_reviews.author: Klaw

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Phrcahse Unless You Have An Engineering Degree To Set Up
customer_reviews.text: Very big and very clumsy. Next to impossible to set up. Bought to use on the beach and cannot even get the poles to stand in the sand. If I saved the box, I would return it. Very unhappy with this purchase unfortunately. Tried to set up with 6 friends 4 times and could not accomplish. Not for regular usage. Not easy set up as stated on description
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W. Handler

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our junior high aged granddaughter. Easy to set up, it stood up well for twelve girls from her volleyball team at a party.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Nierzejewski

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. A big step up from the cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. A big step up from the cheap little kiddie sets. This is a full-size net which was too wide for my space so I just doubled it up so I have the width of the kiddie set but the quality of a real net and strong poles. I was able to attach the support cable to a fence and 2 trees so there's nothing to trip over on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Joe5555

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, nice and sturdy once set up. Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, nice and sturdy once set up. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Nile

customer_reviews.title: Decent set — good family fun
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made for the price point. Fairly easy to assemble with two people. The ball split open on the seam after minimal use but I contacted the company directly and they sent a replacement ball right away.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Only Received the Net & Holder for the Boundary Lines
customer_reviews.text: I only received the net and the holder for the boundary lines for the court. There was nothing else in the box. There was no top to the box and it had tape over the middle of the open end. It's hard to set up the net with no poles or tension lines. It's hard to play volleyball without the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Practical and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and sturdy. We play volleyball a lot with our 2 kids who help us put it up and take it down
customer_reviews.author: mcw

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Cant wait until I took it out of its bag and now my daughter wants to put it up everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Walters

customer_reviews.title: i honestly thought and hoped it would be some what better, but i do give it 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: It was ok, i honestly thought and hoped it would be some what better, but i do give it 4 stars, because it is a decent product, just does not fit our needs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My family and I had a great time everywhere we go
customer_reviews.text: My family and I had a great time everywhere we go. it is easy to assemble and comes with everything you need for hours of fun
customer_reviews.author: osiris

customer_reviews.title: not a quilting ball.with in one game its blasted.not worth....
customer_reviews.text: not a quilting ball.with in one game its blasted.not worth....
customer_reviews.author: Prasad B

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it and it’s easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Martin

customer_reviews.title: One of the better volleyball sets I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: One of the better volleyball sets I have purchased. I believe this will hold up to some rough play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Has held up pretty well. Not very difficult to set up. Fairly sturdy. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect at the beach. Tide downs don't work very well in the sand,but overall it's a great net
customer_reviews.author: Jorge R

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to install and durable.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I disliked was the time to deliver which was about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Affordability
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Works as expected for the price! Can't be beaten!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Extremely difficult to set up. Does not remain standing and we haven't even tried hitting a ball over it. Worst purchase ever. I DO NOT believe that a 13 year old set this up as indicated in another review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality as priced
customer_reviews.text: Only used for 1 day but very cheap quality. Don't expect it to last long. Should have paid more for something more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: TAHJAH

customer_reviews.title: Great potential unfortunately the poles in my set were defective.
customer_reviews.text: I would've given this a 5, but upon receiving the volleyball set and attempting to assemble it one of the poles doesn't click or connect well with the other. It's a defect of the poles. Right away I realized they didnt lock into place, but I needed to use it that weekend so we made due. It stayed upright but comes undone easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! We pull it out when we want ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We pull it out when we want to play with it and put it away when we don't. It's really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding set of the outdoors my kids play volleyball. The height is the actual regulation height . Perfect for practicing and having games
customer_reviews.author: Leabarron Bates

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome set, bought it for up north. Will definitely get it out again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Galdys

customer_reviews.title: Hard to set tension and didn’t hold
customer_reviews.text: Tension pulls never locked despite following very bad on line video and written instructions. Net would never hold tension. Borrowed a friends set with much better configuration
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Volleyball Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great volleyball set, it's very sturdy and rugged and the net is great as are the guides. I really like the fact that it came with rope that allows you to lay out a real volleyball court so that you can see the boundaries.
customer_reviews.author: Bulldog For Life

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This set is very sturdy and the nice metal poles are also sturdy. However the instructions for tying the ropes to secure to the ground are not easy to understand and it took 45 mins to set it up. Overall we have been very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Bissette

customer_reviews.title: I received my volleyball set yesterday. I planned on ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my volleyball set yesterday. I planned on using it on Saturday. When I went to set it up today I am missed the volleyball, instructions, and piece to put in the ground to keep the poles in place. How can I use this with missing pieces???
customer_reviews.author: Jamie A.

customer_reviews.title: Great, except net coming apart already
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set up. Bought this for my daughter who was going to be trying out for the High School Team. Easy for her & a friend(s) to set up. Only issue, is the net is coming apart, so we've had to take electrical tape to hold it together.
customer_reviews.author: She

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy if it is used
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy if it used...... Dont vome with all parts..... Dont come with thw ball pump.... And the lines to adjust the mesh.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Legitimate regulation size. Was bigger than I anticipated. ...
customer_reviews.text: Legitimate regulation size. Was bigger than I anticipated. Double check the size before you buy. But solid net. Worked well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Conway

customer_reviews.title: Best Volleyball/Badmitton set
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality sturdy set. Easy set up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Oma Boogie

customer_reviews.title: Make sure everything is in the package
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for the most part giving it a 3 star rating because it was sent missing pieces which I don’t understand but it happens.
customer_reviews.author: Markus

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this net!
customer_reviews.text: Not the strongest net. The net doesn't stay tight, and the bottom is very loose. Unless you want to mess with making changes to it then do not buy this net. Baden nets are much better quality!
customer_reviews.author: yodera72

customer_reviews.title: very nice set. Watch out for the black pole caps ...
customer_reviews.text: very nice set. Watch out for the black pole caps coming off. I ran one over with the lawn mower already.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your $80
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy. When tightened down it comes loose. Has to put tape under the ring to prevent slipping(example in picture). Just not a great product overall. I guess you get what you pay for at $80 but the Walmart $40 version is just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good to keep outside and play
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to set up... looks hard but it’s not❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️ ****COMES WITH 2 NETS AND I DIDNT KNO*****and they’re huge
customer_reviews.author: Savage

customer_reviews.title: Great for the backyard
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for 2 years in our backyard it’s easy to set up but does require a few people to do it right.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Slack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up -- has been in the yard for six weeks in all weather with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: R. Finley

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. The net can come down pretty easy though. More stakes and rope I think would be helpful. Thanks. We played last night and had fun!
customer_reviews.author: Asorrough

customer_reviews.title: Best Volleyball Net and kit I've used!
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag it comes with- everyone was so happy to use this volleyball net and the ball that came with it---looks and feels professional!
customer_reviews.author: Anas Elmadhun

customer_reviews.title: ... thing you need ropes are remeasured making for very easy set up
customer_reviews.text: comes with every thing you need ropes are remeasured making for very easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up but the metal circles and rope don't like to stay tight had to use tape to hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun game
customer_reviews.text: Our family has loved this volleyball set! It is super easy to set up and take down and provides lots of fun for everyone! Perfect for outdoor entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Allred

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This net is awesome! It took forever to untangle the rope when it came in but over all it is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Tiana

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, very sturdy, packaged well with no damaged or missing pieces! Super nice set!
customer_reviews.author: D Adams-Parkinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for fun - kids or adults. Easy to setup, very durable, good price
customer_reviews.author: J.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the money it will do the job
customer_reviews.author: brian kasper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than expected. Setup was very easy, except the string for the out of bounds marker was a complete mess. It came out of the box all knotted up.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Survived a summer
customer_reviews.text: Great net and tools. Let’s see if it can take on summer #2
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use at my daughters 13th birthday and it held up to 10 teenagers.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Watch the quality...
customer_reviews.text: Net and poles are great. Ball came flat (with leaks at the seams). Too much of a pain to return the whole thing...
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Huge net! I bought this for a beach game ...
customer_reviews.text: Huge net! I bought this for a beach game amongst friends and it was too big for just 4 players. But the net and all the parts are made very well.
customer_reviews.author: K4K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Complete set. Easy to set up. Be sure to measure your yard. This thing is big.
customer_reviews.author: Steven and Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Torn volleyball after one use
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about the net itself but the volleyball tore as seen in the picture after just about an hour of use. This problem can be alleviated if I am sent another volleyball.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Syme

customer_reviews.title: This is a great backyard set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backyard set. I ordered it for my young volleyball player. The net was easy to set up and stayed in place well with the guide ropes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schuman

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: It works great. My cousin had it up and ready to play by the time I finished reading the setup instructions. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Drakus

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, not your typical Walmart set! ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, not your typical Walmart set! Solid construction poles, heavy gauge netting. I would have given it 5 stars but the tiny little ball pump was ineffective so we used our air compressor.
customer_reviews.author: propertyinnevada

customer_reviews.title: A nightmare to untangled the attachment ropes.
customer_reviews.text: Received and tried to assemble and could not untangle the ropes , 1.5 hrs later and gave up
customer_reviews.author: Zachary G.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and (so far) good quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our daughter's birthday. It was easy to set up and so far (had it a month) it's held up quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Kfred

customer_reviews.title: Missing equipment bag.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't set it up yet, but it looks okay. Missing the equipment bag and can't figure out how to contact Amazon to get one. Also, no instructions included.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Nice complete set. We have a tall family and this set is taller then any other fold up set we have used.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The volleyball gear was shipped properly. The set-up is easy and held sturdy in the ground. Didn't require any extra support; we only used what came in the box.
customer_reviews.author: YamiLaz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but wobbly.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great, sturdy set. Only problem is the anchoring system is not that great. Doesn't take much of a wind to knock the whole thing over.
customer_reviews.author: Andi Eisele

product_meta.title: Park & Sun Sports Spiker Sport: Portable Outdoor Volleyball Net System
feature_bullets: 3-piece premium steel poles measure 1-1/2" in diameter, Eye Bolt system allows for you set either men's, women's and co-ed playing heights
Features a regulation size (32' L x 3' H) Momentum net, Nylon blend net has a 1-1/2" top tape and is equipped with side straps to quickly attach to poles
3/16" double guy line with tension rings allow for quick adjustments that ensure the net remains taut, even during rough play
Define your court with the 3/16" diameter, pre-measured boundary (60' L x 30' W) which is firmly secured to the ground with corner anchors
Includes a Soft Touch volleyball, which lessens the impact to wrists and arms, entire set fits inside a heavy-duty polyester zippered equipment bag with carrying handles
Webbing Boundaries: A great accessory for any outdoor volleyball court and is adjustable to FIVB standards.
